data.text: Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, Nguluwi yalinguhilula chibida,
Wime, gwa mtagusa wa isi yeng'ha,
Mbaka hanili, gwa Mkulu Nguluwi,
Wangulonga ulonzi wa ujuvi,
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, wanguwadumya wanhu wa hegwe,
Wanguwakopola wadala wafililwe na walume wawo na wajenzi,
Wangulonga, â€œMkulu Nguluwi halingona hebu,
Hemwe wapoka wa kuduma, mijese hado.
Yaliditile ikutu, ndaze, howeza kuhulika?
Ndaze, yalinguwazapa wanhu wa isi howeza kugaza?
Mkulu Nguluwi kangugazela majesa ga wanhu,
Gwa Mkulu Nguluwi, nakatambichizwa munhu ulingumzapa,
leka zuwa lya magazo yesele,
Mkulu Nguluwi howaleka wanhu wa heye,
Kwa vila nhaguso zolavigwa kwa hachi,
Whaani yawele yanhanzile kitwanza na munhu mwihe?
Wone Mkulu Nguluwi yahalechile kunhanza,
Londijesile kota ndangutelela,
Kusanzalima kwa nhumbula ya heni hokuwa kwinji lukami,
Hegwe huweza kihanza na watagusa wehile,
Wangikungajiza kuwaditila wihe watanganiche,
Ila Mkulu Nguluwi ndo ngome ya heni,
Wihe wa hewo, heye kowahilusila hewo wawo,
